import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import '../styles/PurchaseRequest.css'; const ViewForm = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [form, setForm] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { fetchForm(); // eslint-disable-next-line }, []); const fetchForm = async () => { try { const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); const response = await axios.get(`http://192.168.17.15:5000/api/forms/${id}`, { headers: { 'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}` } }); if (response.data) { console.log("API Response:", response.data); // ‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á details ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô object ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô string if (typeof response.data.details === 'string') { try { response.data.details = JSON.parse(response.data.details); } catch (err) { console.error("Error parsing details:", err); response.data.details = {}; } } setForm(response.data); } else { alert("‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏û‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ü‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡∏°"); } } catch (error) { console.error("‚ùå Error fetching form:", error); alert("‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏û‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏î‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏î‡∏∂‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•"); } }; const handleDownloadPDF = () => { const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); window.open(`http://192.168.17.15:5000/api/forms/${id}/pdf?token=${token}`, '_blank'); }; if (!form) return

; // ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å form.details const detailsObj = form.details || {}; console.log("Form Details:", detailsObj); const { name, department, date, deliveryDate, items = [], vendorName, vendorAddress1, vendorAddress2, vendorZip, CountryZip, currency, terms, supervisorEmail, reasonType, reasonComments, depManagerComment, gmComment, signRequester, dateRequester, signDepartmentManager, dateDepartmentManager, signGeneralManager, dateGeneralManager, subTotal, vat, grandTotal } = detailsObj; const isTHB = currency === 'THB'; const vatLabel = isTHB ? 'VAT (7%)' : 'VAT (0%)'; const subTotalStr = (subTotal || 0).toLocaleString('en-US', { minimumFractionDigits: 2 }); const vatStr = (vat || 0).toLocaleString('en-US', { minimumFractionDigits: 2 }); const grandTotalStr = (grandTotal || 0).toLocaleString('en-US', { minimumFractionDigits: 2 }); return (
